name: billboard_u_s_afrobeats_songs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool billboard_api.
Tool description: Providing the Billboard chart rankings and information on titles, artists, lyrics, images, and more. 
API description: Fetch the BILLBOARD U.S. AFROBEATS SONGS chart information for a given date and range.

date.description: The date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' for which the chart information is to be fetched.

range.description: The range of songs to be included in the chart, with a maximum range of 1-50.
